Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Prohibits the investment of certain public funds with the Trump organization
Summary: Prohibits the investment of certain public funds with the Trump organization; directs the comptroller to take appropriate action to sell, redeem, divest or withdraw any investment held in such organization.
LawCode: Add ยง423-d, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to prohibiting the investment of certain public funds with the Trump organization
